metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7444 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Special:Contributions page in MediaWiki before 1.22.0 allows remote attackers to determine if an IP is autoblocked via the "Change block" text.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2013-7444` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.25.5-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.25.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.25.5-1').
